TestCase.name: testNestedProject
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(id=[$0], nestedName=[$1.nested1.name], nestedValue=[$2.value], nestedFlag=[$1.nested2.flag], nestedNum=[$1.nested2.num]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(read nested fields: id.*, deepNested.*, nested.*, name.*)]]])

Calc(select=[id, deepNested.nested1.name AS nestedName, nested.value AS nestedValue, deepNested.nested2.flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested.nested2.num AS nestedNum]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(read nested fields: id.*, deepNested.nested2.num, deepNested.nested2.flag, deepNested.nested1.name, nested.value)]]], fields=[id, deepNested, nested])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTableSourceOverWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$3], valSum=[AS(SUM($2) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 NULLS FIRST RANGE 7200000 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'valSum')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]])

Calc(select=[id, name, w0$o0 AS valSum], where=[>(w0$o0, 100)]) +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[id], orderBy=[proctime ASC], window=[ RANG BETWEEN 7200000 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[id, proctime, val, name, SUM(val) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]], fields=[id, proctime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTableSourceSimple
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(proctime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]])
Calc(select=[PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(proctime) AS proctime, id, name, val]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]], fields=[id, proctime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectOnlyProctime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ptime=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]])

Calc(select=[PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(ptime) AS ptime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectOnlyRowtime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(rtime=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]])
Calc(select=[rtime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithMapping
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$4], rtime=[$1], val=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: p-rtime, p-id, p-name, p-val)]]])

Calc(select=[name, rtime, val]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: p-rtime, p-id, p-name, p-val)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testRowTimeTableSourceGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$0], EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{3}], EXPR$1=[AVG($2)], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[name, EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[name], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0], select=[name, AVG(val) AS EXPR$1, end('w) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Calc(select=[id, rowtime, val, name], where=[>(val, 100)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutProctime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$4], val=[$2], rtime=[$1], id=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]])

Calc(select=[name, val, rtime, id]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, rtime, val, name)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithRowtimeProctime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$4], val=[$2], id=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]])

Calc(select=[name, val, id]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithTimestampRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(rowtime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])
Calc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutRowtime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ptime=[$3], name=[$4], val=[$2], id=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]])

Calc(select=[PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(ptime) AS ptime, name, val, id]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithLongRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(rowtime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])
Calc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])
